attributes.action: Ban the ownership of all guns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the apalling death of Rhys Jones.I urge the Prime Minister to ban the ownership of all guns.I very much feel that in a civilised society that there is no need whatsoever to own a gun.I really want to help stop the deaths of so many people and banning all guns will very much help.
